ext_weather.name: Overnight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Areas of fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2am, then areas of fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 62. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
